title: Interview game: Body language
brief_description: Gestures, facial expressions and posture are non-verbal ways of communicating feelings and attitude. How to read and react to body language is the subject of this video. It promotes the kind of people skills needed when conducting or going for a job interview. Factors contributing to successful inteviews which are covered include: preparation, location of the interview, placement of the furniture, note taking and speech patterns.
